query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZMMT017_M SET PRO_F = '2' , RECE_DATE = SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8) , RECE_TIME = SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),9,6) , DEL_DATE = SAPHEE.SET_ZERODATE('','D') , DEL_TIME = SAPHEE.SET_ZERODATE('','T') WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PRO_F = '1' AND DDATE = '00000000' AND MENGE > 0 AND INVNR = #INVNR#
